title: Harchive
author: Harchive
content: I have two questions for XRP and Sologenic investors, thanks for your time 1. If XRP fails in the future will all XRP ledger projects face the same demise? Is Sologenic future dependant on XRP performance?2. I am holding Sologenic BSC chain and I want to know if I will still qualify for their airdrop in Coreum like I heard. Thanks for taking your time to read

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: Well this is not the right board to discuss. You can move it to the Altcoin Discussion board. [1][1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=67.0

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Well at first since XRP is the main blockchain, I’m sure that all projects working specifically for XRP ecosystem will surely suffer XRP fate but they ca always migrate and rebuild on different blockchain to offer same service to different people. Dapps can survive a blockchain fall because they can migrate on different blockchain to continue the project while the blockchain project itself has no capacity to do it.Airdrop, Usually only rewards those token holders that holds there token on native blockchain. You should bridge it to XRP if there’s any feature like that available.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Harchive on October 12, 2022, 12:30:36 PM2. I am holding Sologenic BSC chain and I want to know if I will still qualify for their airdrop in Coreum like I heard. You can the detailed info about the Coreum airdrop here https://sologenic.medium.com/guidelines-for-solo-holders-to-establish-a-trustline-to-receive-coreum-core-airdrop-9a705336f4c6You can only received an airdrop if you have $SOLO tokens stored on XRP Ledger or any decentralized wallets that support $SOLO tokens which already mention on the article that I share here. The snapshot of your balance is done at random time so make sure to convert your BSC tokens to XRP tokens since it’s the only way to snapshot your rewards. The easy way is to deposit your tokens on CEX that supports the snapshot of this airdrop for a less hassle transition for you.

Have been in the bear and bull market, seen the worst already. Not unless the people behind suddenly decided to quit and not maintain it which is unlikely to happen, in my opinion.
